00097 DdManager *
00098 Cudd_Init(
00099   unsigned int numVars /* initial number of BDD variables (i.e., subtables) */,
00100   unsigned int numVarsZ /* initial number of ZDD variables (i.e., subtables) */,
00101   unsigned int numSlots /* initial size of the unique tables */,
00102   unsigned int cacheSize /* initial size of the cache */,
00103   unsigned long maxMemory /* target maximum memory occupation */)
00104 {
00105     DdManager *unique;
00106     int i,result;
00107     DdNode *one, *zero;
00108     unsigned int maxCacheSize;
00109     unsigned int looseUpTo;
00110 
00111     unique = cuddInitTable(numVars,numVarsZ,numSlots);
00112     if (unique == NULL) return(NULL);
00113     if (maxMemory == 0) {
00114         maxMemory = getSoftDataLimit();
00115     } else {
00116         looseUpTo = (unsigned int) ((maxMemory / sizeof(DdCache)) /
00117                                     DD_MAX_LOOSE_FRACTION);
00118         Cudd_SetLooseUpTo(unique,looseUpTo);
00119     }
00120     maxCacheSize = (unsigned int) ((maxMemory / sizeof(DdCache)) /
00121                                    DD_MAX_CACHE_FRACTION);
00122     result = cuddInitCache(unique,cacheSize,maxCacheSize);
00123     if (result == 0) return(NULL);
00124 
00125     /* Initialize constants. */
00126     unique->one = cuddUniqueConst(unique,1.0);
00127     if (unique->one == NULL) return(0);
00128     cuddRef(unique->one);
00129     unique->zero = cuddUniqueConst(unique,0.0);
00130     if (unique->zero == NULL) return(0);
00131     cuddRef(unique->zero);
00132 #ifdef HAVE_IEEE_754
00133     if (DD_PLUS_INF_VAL != DD_PLUS_INF_VAL * 3 ||
00134         DD_PLUS_INF_VAL != DD_PLUS_INF_VAL / 3) {
00135         (void) fprintf(stderr,"Warning: Crippled infinite values\n");
00136         (void) fprintf(stderr,"Recompile without -DHAVE_IEEE_754\n");
00137     }
00138 #endif
00139     unique->plusinfinity = cuddUniqueConst(unique,DD_PLUS_INF_VAL);
00140     if (unique->plusinfinity == NULL) return(0);
00141     cuddRef(unique->plusinfinity);
00142     unique->minusinfinity = cuddUniqueConst(unique,DD_MINUS_INF_VAL);
00143     if (unique->minusinfinity == NULL) return(0);
00144     cuddRef(unique->minusinfinity);
00145     unique->background = unique->zero;
00146 
00147     /* The logical zero is different from the CUDD_VALUE_TYPE zero! */
00148     one = unique->one;
00149     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00150     /* Create the projection functions. */
00151 #ifdef __osf__
00152 #pragma pointer_size save
00153 #pragma pointer_size short
00154 #endif
00155     unique->vars = ALLOC(DdNode *,unique->maxSize);
00156 #ifdef __osf__
00157 #pragma pointer_size restore
00158 #endif
00159     if (unique->vars == NULL) {
00160         unique->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00161         return(NULL);
00162     }
00163     for (i = 0; i < unique->size; i++) {
00164         unique->vars[i] = cuddUniqueInter(unique,i,one,zero);
00165         if (unique->vars[i] == NULL) return(0);
00166         cuddRef(unique->vars[i]);
00167     }
00168 
00169     if (unique->sizeZ)
00170         cuddZddInitUniv(unique);
00171 
00172     unique->memused += sizeof(DdNode *) * unique->maxSize;
00173     
00174     return(unique);
00175 
00176 } /* end of Cudd_Init */
00177

00192 void
00193 Cudd_Quit(
00194   DdManager * unique)
00195 {
00196     cuddFreeTable(unique);
00197 
00198 } /* end of Cudd_Quit */

00205 
00218 int
00219 cuddZddInitUniv(
00220   DdManager * zdd)
00221 {
00222     DdNode      *p, *res;
00223     int         i;
00224 
00225 #ifdef __osf__
00226 #pragma pointer_size save
00227 #pragma pointer_size short
00228 #endif
00229     zdd->univ = ALLOC(DdNode *, zdd->sizeZ);
00230 #ifdef __osf__
00231 #pragma pointer_size restore
00232 #endif
00233     if (zdd->univ == NULL) {
00234         zdd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00235         return(0);
00236     }
00237 
00238     res = DD_ONE(zdd);
00239     cuddRef(res);
00240     for (i = zdd->sizeZ - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00241         unsigned int index = zdd->invpermZ[i];
00242         p = res;
00243         res = cuddUniqueInterZdd(zdd, index, p, p);
00244         if (res == NULL) {
00245             Cudd_RecursiveDerefZdd(zdd,p);
00246             FREE(zdd->univ);
00247             return(0);
00248         }
00249         cuddRef(res);
00250         cuddDeref(p);
00251         zdd->univ[i] = res;
00252     }
00253 
00254 #ifdef DD_VERBOSE
00255     cuddZddP(zdd, zdd->univ[0]);
00256 #endif
00257 
00258     return(1);
00259 
00260 } /* end of cuddZddInitUniv */
00261 
00262 
00274 void
00275 cuddZddFreeUniv(
00276   DdManager * zdd)
00277 {
00278     if (zdd->univ) {
00279         Cudd_RecursiveDerefZdd(zdd, zdd->univ[0]);
00280         FREE(zdd->univ);
00281     }
00282 
00283 } /* end of cuddZddFreeUniv */
